meanings.definition: A person or thing that stripes.
meanings.sent1: The artist used different colors to create beautiful stripers on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The zebra is a natural example of stripers in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The stripers on the road seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity turned her into a human canvas, a walking masterpiece of stripers.
meanings.sent5: The stripers on his shirt made him stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A type of fish with dark stripes along its body.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had a tank full of colorful stripers swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent2: Fishing enthusiasts love to catch stripers in the nearby lake.
meanings.sent3: The stripers in the ocean had a secret underwater stripe club.
meanings.sent4: The stripers moved in perfect harmony, like a synchronized swimming team.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the stripers' stripes mesmerized the onlookers.

meanings.definition: A type of worker who paints stripes on roads or parking lots.
meanings.sent1: The stripers were busy marking the lanes on the freshly paved road.
meanings.sent2: Drivers followed the directions given by the stripers on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The stripers joked that they were professional line artists.
meanings.sent4: The stripers transformed the plain parking lot into a colorful maze.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the stripers' work ensured smooth traffic flow.
